taskbody.context: To mark fragments in a document, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Click the Highlight icon on the toolbar.
step.stepresult: The highlighting mode is on. The cursor changes to a dedicated symbol that has the same color with the one set in the Highlight palette.

step.cmd: Select the text you want to highlight with your cursor.
To choose a different color, click the small arrow next to the Highlight icon and select the color that you want to use.
To exit the highlighting mode, press on your keyboard, click the Highlight icon, or start editing the document.
